mapper.insert: load data local infile '${fileName}' into table enterprise_info fields terminated by ',' lines terminated by '\n' (name,contact,phone,email,address,legal_representative,create_time,province,city,county);
insert into liepin.enterprise_ocean (create_time, info_id) select now(),id from enterprise_info;
mapper.select:
select enterprise_private_followup.id, enterprise_private_followup.followup_id, user.username as followUp, enterprise_private_followup.time, enterprise_private_followup.next_time, enterprise_private_followup.remark from enterprise_private_followup left join enterprise_private on enterprise_private.id = enterprise_private_followup.private_id left join enterprise_info on enterprise_info.id = enterprise_private.info_id left join user on user.id = enterprise_private_followup.followup_id where enterprise_info.dlt = 'NO' and enterprise_info.id = #{id} order by id desc
limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
